item.title: Tidyverse: rows as vectors? (Updated)
item.description: This has been bothering me for a while: is there a good simple way to apply a formula to rows of a data frame or table, where the formula would consume the rows as vectors? Update: There is actually a very simple way to do it. See the next post.
